name: Dobre Dunk
description:
DUNK THE DOBRE BROTHERS! Dunk your favorite Dobre Brother - Cyrus, Darius, Lucas, Marcus - as many times as you can! Flip and flop your way to the hoop and see who makes the most dunks with a Dobre.

MOST DUNKS WINS - Tap left and right to flip and flop your Dobre for the most dunks!
WIN TOURNAMENTS - Make it to the Finals and beware the mighty RANDOM BOXING GLOVE.
UNLOCK OUTFITS - Collect Bikini Cyrus, Tux Darius, Lit Lucas, Insane Marcus and more!

Get Dobre Dunk NOW and see how well you dunk a Dobre Brother.


DOBRE ARMY, GAME ON!
